about_the_game:
As a hiker having lost your way you are starting a journey from the middle of aforest. You need to survive and keep moving. Which direction? There are no signs to be found, just an endless forest as far as you can see. The challenging part is trying not to go in circles and keep the initial direction. A small helper here is a distance counter in the upper right hand corner of the screen, where you can also see the time spent in the current journey. And the further you go, the more intricate the obstacles!
On starting the game you've got two choices - go for the long run in an endless forest where you can build your score, or else begin a short run with a goal - a city in a given distance, where you can master your speed runs.
In this game you can use different weapons for hunting and fighting, make campfires and cook meat, find scattered chests with food, weapons and random tools to survive. Have a safe run!

content_descriptors.notes: It's possible to get in fight with animals that could result in animal or player character death.

detailed_description:
As a hiker having lost your way you are starting a journey from the middle of aforest. You need to survive and keep moving. Which direction? There are no signs to be found, just an endless forest as far as you can see. The challenging part is trying not to go in circles and keep the initial direction. A small helper here is a distance counter in the upper right hand corner of the screen, where you can also see the time spent in the current journey. And the further you go, the more intricate the obstacles!
On starting the game you've got two choices - go for the long run in an endless forest where you can build your score, or else begin a short run with a goal - a city in a given distance, where you can master your speed runs.
In this game you can use different weapons for hunting and fighting, make campfires and cook meat, find scattered chests with food, weapons and random tools to survive. Have a safe run!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Six core CPU 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM

name: Hightail

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Six-Core Intel i7 CPU @ 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: How far can you survive? This game will give you a challenge to survive the wildlands and collect miles as you drift in unknown direction and try to avoid obstacles.
